file_insights.content_summary: Comprehensive content publishing workflow documentation for Infinity Cards blog platform

patterns_discovered.description: Document follows a logical progression from content generation through publication to post-publication monitoring
patterns_discovered.impact: Enables users to understand complete workflow end-to-end

patterns_discovered.description: Provides both automated (BlogAgent) and manual content creation paths
patterns_discovered.impact: Accommodates different user workflows and preferences

patterns_discovered.description: Includes frontmatter requirements, SEO checklist, and quality verification steps
patterns_discovered.impact: Ensures consistent content quality and technical compliance

patterns_discovered.description: File paths, essential commands, and troubleshooting guide provided for rapid access
patterns_discovered.impact: Reduces friction for users needing quick answers

patterns_discovered.description: Documentation emphasizes Markdown with frontmatter approach for content management
patterns_discovered.impact: Leverages git-based version control for content

gotchas_discovered.description: Posts with `published: false` will not appear live despite being in correct directory
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Provided explicit instructions to toggle `published: true` before pushing to production

gotchas_discovered.description: YAML frontmatter syntax errors will prevent build completion
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Included validation step in build process and error checking in troubleshooting

gotchas_discovered.description: Images must be under 200KB and specific dimensions (1200x630px) for optimal performance
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Documented requirements and provided optimization guidelines

gotchas_discovered.description: Posts must use `.mdx` extension, not `.md`, for proper rendering
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Clearly stated in multiple locations: file creation steps and troubleshooting

gotchas_discovered.description: Local preview may not catch all issues that become apparent during production build
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Included explicit `npm run build` step in publishing checklist

approach_outcome.objective: Create comprehensive content publishing workflow documentation
approach_outcome.completeness: Full workflow coverage from content generation through publication and monitoring
quality_indicators: Clear section hierarchy with logical progression
Quick reference tables for rapid access
Best practices guidance for content strategy and SEO

recommendations.rationale: ASCII flowchart provided but could benefit from visual representation of the publishing pipeline stages
Users could copy/paste standard frontmatter template rather than manually creating structure
Documentation mentions analytics verification but lacks details on initial setup of tracking
Document includes tools and services (Ahrefs, SEMrush) that may change or require version updates
Complex workflow with multiple tools could benefit from walkthrough video for visual learners
Current process relies on manual verification; automated checks would catch YAML errors earlier
Document notes v1.0 but lacks clear versioning strategy for future updates
